title: The Basketball Captain is Determined to Date Me - Novel Updates
tags: Academy   Doting Love Interests   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Military   Modern Day   Shameless Protagonist
author: 晏十日
description: This is a cute fluffy story about Xie Jun, a basketball captain from a prestigious military family and an outgoing youth, Zhuang Yi. During a basketball match between the two, Zhuang Yi distracted Xie Jun by blowing ‘kissing noises’ at him. The captain later comes to collect on this debt…>
